tasks.name: 产生纯净余烬
tasks.desc: 以你的灵魂余烬为催化剂，结晶出新的纯净余烬。

tasks.name: 召唤伊弗利特的爪子
tasks.desc: 火焰永不熄灭，只是消散。
tasks.needtext: Must have at least 1 inventory space free.

tasks.name: 伊弗利特的爪子
tasks.desc: 噬咬的火焰，形如利爪，撕裂所有与你为敌之人。臣服于毁灭吧。
tasks.needtext: Must have at least 1 inventory space free.

tasks.name: 熔岩垂钓
tasks.desc: 钓取黑曜石鱼、焰鳍锦鲤以及各种其他熔岩生物。留下有价值的部分自用，其余出售。
tasks.flavor: 蝾螈牛排的市场竟然出奇地大，谁能想到呢……

upgrades.name: 平衡
upgrades.desc: 给予足够的时间，任何系统都会趋于平衡

upgrades.name: 雷击
upgrades.desc: 解锁你内在的火焰潜力
upgrades.extdesc: 建议您先阅读相关的词汇表条目
upgrades.needtext: Find and decipher the notes on pyromancy. They can be found in a charred shack.

upgrades.name: 热力学研究
upgrades.desc: 真正的火焰大师必须精通热力学的奥秘

upgrades.name: 热力烙印
upgrades.desc: 施加奥术烙印可显著加快热量传递

upgrades.name: 热力支配
upgrades.desc: 仿佛有一个无形的恶魔任你差遣
upgrades.flavor: 如果他存在，你大概会给他取名叫麦克斯韦

upgrades.name: 火焰领域
upgrades.desc: 驾驭火山之力，增幅你的魔法

upgrades.name: 火葬
upgrades.desc: 为你的葬礼服务增添一点额外内容
upgrades.flavor: 很少有人能将尸体化为灰烬。你就是其中之一

upgrades.name: 火焰之语
upgrades.desc: 他们说火焰中藏着每一本被焚烧书籍的秘密。或许这是真的
upgrades.flavor: 最好别去想那些因“不雅”而被烧毁的书籍

upgrades.name: 流淌的火焰
upgrades.desc: 火焰摇曳起舞，你亦如此

upgrades.name: 异域燃料
upgrades.desc: 一系列奥术材料，有助于生产并将火焰注入物体
upgrades.flavor: 很多东西都会燃烧。其中一些以大多数人前所未见的方式燃烧

upgrades.name: 地狱火药剂
upgrades.desc: 大多数炼金术士会建议在遇到你所能制造的混合物时立即逃跑
upgrades.extdesc: 用更高级的药剂取代火焰药剂和不稳定混合物。
upgrades.flavor: ……它还会与布料、木材和倒霉的学徒发生自燃反应，更不用说石棉、沙子和水——与水会发生爆炸性反应

upgrades.name: 火山稳定
upgrades.desc: 控制岩浆流动，以有效利用更多空间。

upgrades.name: 高温冶炼
upgrades.desc: 利用你对火焰的掌控，从矿石中提取额外材料。

upgrades.name: 创造之焰
upgrades.desc: 捕获一缕原始火焰的余烬供自己使用。
upgrades.flavor: 有了它，可能性似乎无穷无尽

upgrades.name: 冷却浸泡
upgrades.desc: 作为你放松日常的一部分，跳入一桶冰水中。

spells.name: 灼热箭
spells.desc: 一支带有余焰的火焰箭

spells.name: 岩浆箭
spells.desc: 一支液态炽热的岩浆箭

spells.name: 火焰打击
spells.desc: 在攻击前用火焰灌注你的武器。
spells.needtext: Currently equipped weapon must be martial

spells.name: 大火
spells.desc: 焚烧所有挡在你面前的人

spells.name: 灼热光辉
spells.desc: 万物皆将在火焰中消亡

spells.name: 灼热蒸汽
spells.desc: 向敌人释放一股极其炽热的蒸汽

spells.name: 灼热之风
spells.desc: 用灼热的阵风冲击敌人
spells.flavor: 这就像短暂地造访地狱

spells.name: 点燃
spells.desc: 爆炸性地引燃一颗灵魂余烬
spells.needtext: Cannot be performed when suffering from consuming flames

spells.name: 灵魂烈焰
spells.desc: 消耗一颗灵魂余烬，将周围笼罩在释放的能量中
spells.needtext: Blazing flames must be at least half of max (but not less than 50)

spells.name: 闪火
spells.desc: 瞬间释放一颗宝石价值的火焰

spells.name: 燃烧
spells.desc: 使用一颗火焰宝石来点燃内在的火焰。

homes.name: 火山巢穴
homes.desc: 在火焰山中凿出的简陋巢穴

furniture.name: 余烬基座
furniture.desc: 安全地存放你的灵魂余烬。

furniture.name: 热容装置
furniture.desc: 一个装有附魔水的大型水箱，能够瞬间将热量传递给你或从你身上带走。

furniture.name: 热导体
furniture.desc: 一系列旨在冷却你的热容装置的附魔。
furniture.flavor: 附魔制冰机、特殊计算的气流、烧烤酱……

resources.name: 灵魂余烬
resources.flavor: 小心，以免它变成一场野火。

resources.name: 炽热
resources.desc: 你积聚的热量，随时准备将敌人烧成灰烬
resources.flavor: 一个全身散发着炽热能量的控火师，其景象蔚为壮观

resources.name: 噬魂之焰
resources.desc: 你缺乏控制导致体内的火焰挣脱束缚。

resources.name: 纯净余烬
resources.desc: 结晶化的灵魂之火，以湮灭能量淬炼而成。
resources.flavor: 弥足珍贵，绝不可托付于任何人。

classes.flavor: 体内的火焰汹涌澎湃，渴望释放
不灭之焰，为你永恒炽烈

rares.name: 伊弗利特的利爪
rares.desc: 由冰冻火焰制成，其力量随主人的强弱而起伏

rares.name: 焦黑锁链
rares.desc: 布满烟灰，部分熔化，但历经岁月依然坚固

clashes.name: 受火诅咒的小屋
clashes.desc: 传闻在森林深处，有一间曾住着一位痴迷火焰的巫师的小屋。他已多年未现身，但小屋中仍散发出可怕的热量

monsters.name: 被吞噬的幽影
monsters.desc: 它曾是一个人，但已被火焰由内而外地吞噬

potions.name: 炼狱鸡尾酒
potions.desc: 一种危险的易燃酒精混合物，无烟燃烧，亮度极低，在地牢中几乎无法察觉。

potions.name: 龙火药剂
potions.desc: 一种即将发生的连锁反应，被巧妙地悬浮着。其火焰会附着在目标身上，直至血肉无存。

glossaryentries.name: 灵魂余烬与纯净余烬
desc: ➢ Soul embers are the fuel for your Pyromancer's flames. They increase your Blazing Heat production at the expense of worsening Consuming Flames.
➢ You can obtain Soul embers by performing the 'Ignite Ember' task once you have purchased the 'Soulflames' skill.
➢ Balancing Soul embers with your spelllist to achieve thermal equilibrium is paramount to ensuring your wizard's survival in combat.
➢ A combination of the 'Inflame' and 'Soul Blaze' spells can tune your Soul ember to a generally sustainable range, by reducing if too hot or increasing if too cold.
➢ Pure embers are a resource used to purchase various upgrades for your Pyromancer. They can be produced by using your Blazing Heat as cost for the 'Produce Pure Embers' task.
The amount of Pure embers generated will equal your Soul ember count.

glossaryentries.name: 炽热与噬魂之焰
desc: ➢ Upon casting fire spells, igniting enough soul embers or utilizing specialized techniques, your Pyromancer will begin to accumulate 'Blazing heat'.
➢ This empowers most fire spells and increases your Fire mana rate. However, there is a limit to how much Blazing Heat your wizard can sustain.
➢ The downside to accruing large amounts of Blazing Heat, is a negative Menace called Consuming Flames.
➢ Consuming Flames have no immediate effect on your wizard's well-being, however letting them accumulate to your maximum will cause a forced retreat and a loss of any ongoing exploration or combat.
Therefore, ensuring that your flames are controlled is of paramount priority.
➢ There are several equilibrium upgrades which help in maintaining this delicate balance. You can also use the 'Disperse Heat' and 'Fan the Flames' actions to quickly manipulate it.
➢ Some general tips to manage heat are as follows:

• Memorize the vent spells of different elements your Pyromancer will unlock. These include Scalding Steam, Molten Earth and Searing Wind. Adding enough of these will eventually counterbalance your fire spells' heat.
• Switching to the 'Cooling Immersion' Leisure in the Player Tab.
• Purchasing the Heat Capacitor and Heat Conductor furnitures.

upgrades.name: 不朽火堆
upgrades.desc: 永恒炽烈，它时刻提醒着不可避免的终结。

upgrades.name: 焦黑笔记
upgrades.desc: 在一次失败实验的地点发现，只有技艺精湛的控火师才有机会解读它们。

tasks.name: 解读控火师的笔记
tasks.desc: 你在那间小屋里找到的笔记终于开始变得有意义了。
tasks.extdesc: 永久解锁控火术词汇表条目。完成此操作后，在后续的游戏中无需再次执行。
